marklogic.body: You're joking right ? My brother just bought an ASUS transformer and i bought a new . He didn't know there was an HDMI adapter for the so we agreed on a showdown. Â We put the same file onto both tables. The transformer could not even play the 6 GB 1080p movie onto his TV via HDMI smoothly. Â It would skip a lot of frames. Â He downloaded a different app and it was even worse. Â I connected my IPad to the same HDMI cable and it played without Hiccups
